Paragraph: CONCLUSION : Our results did not lend strong support to the view that the genetic variation of the DRD2 gene plays a major role in the individually variable adverse effect induced by chlorpromazine , at least in Chinese patients with schizophrenia .

The disease entity in the paragraph is "schizophrenia". It is a mental disorder characterized by abnormal behavior, strange speech, and a decreased ability to understand reality. In this paragraph, it is mentioned in relation to Chinese patients and the genetic variation of the DRD2 gene.
